item.title: Special Kebab Recipe!
item.description:
Ingredients:

  • 500gr 50% pork - 50% beef mince
  • 1 tablespoon of condensed tomato juice
  • 1 tablespoon of Greek yoghurt
  • 2/3 tablespoon of cummin
  • 1 tablespoon of ground paprika
  • 1 teaspoon of ground garlic
  • 1.5 tablespoons of oregano
  • 1.5 tablespoons of thyme

item.title: Atom and RSS feeds: The best way to keep up with the blog!
item.description:
In this post, I will try to briefly explain what Atom and RSS feeds are and why they are in my opinion the best way to keep up with your favourite blogs and news websites.

Really Simple Syndication (RSS)

item.title: This post was created with neovim from my phone!
item.description:
This post was created from my phone. Don't think that's a big deal? Well let me tell you why you're mistaken.

I folllow a very specific process for editing this blog. I write each post in markdown and I use pelican to convert everything to html and create a static …
